collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, update your profile, or contact us for support. This includes your name, email address, and reading preferences.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to process transactions, to send you technical notices and support messages, and to respond to your comments and questions.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as described in this policy. We may share information with service providers who perform services on our behalf.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We take reasonable measures to help protect your personal information from loss, theft, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@pubstation.com.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using PubStation, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

service.title: Description of Service
service.content: PubStation provides access to public domain e-books in multiple languages. We offer both free and premium subscription tiers with varying levels of access and features.

account.title: User Accounts
account.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.

content.title: Content
content.content: All books available on PubStation are in the public domain. We do not claim ownership of these works. User-generated content such as bookmarks and reading progress remains your property.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The PubStation service, including its design, features, and functionality, is owned by us and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, or distribute our service without permission.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for any reason, including violation of these terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: PubStation is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service.

about.title: About PubStation
about.subtitle: Your gateway to classic literature from around the world

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: PubStation is dedicated to making classic literature accessible to everyone, regardless of language or location. We believe that great books should be available to all readers, which is why we focus on public domain works that can be freely shared and enjoyed.

books.title: Thousands of Books
books.description: Access a vast library of classic literature from renowned authors throughout history.

community.title: Growing Community
community.description: Join readers from around the world who share a love for classic literature.

free.title: Free Access
free.description: All public domain books are available for free, forever.

publicDomain.title: About Public Domain
publicDomain.content: Public domain works are those whose intellectual property rights have expired, been forfeited, or are inapplicable. This means these works can be freely used, shared, and enjoyed by anyone without permission or payment.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, suggestions, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out.
